text: <@U4FP56WS2> Not sure about putting in 'user is not a robot' for precondition. I'm not going to put in that robot check thing because idk how. One important precondition though is that the user is not already logged in.
good reason.i just want put a click button at the end of resignation like 'I am a robot ! No/yes"
I will add the user is not already logged in ,that is important precondition
You mean you'll add the functionality for checking if people are robots? That's outside of scope for now. Not necessary.
Yeah I agree with u,
<https://www.google.com/recaptcha/intro/invisible.html>
We just want to be careful to avoid scope creep.
Focus should be on main user functions. We can add bells and whistles later.
Btw I'm trying to do project charter now. I'm not sure who to put down as stakeholders aside from us and Homy?

Should be Homy, because he mentioned that's he will ask every group to add some functions&challenges, and each group have to decide to do so or to convince him, so I think he will be both client and supervisor.
I know but the implications seems to be that there are more than one stakeholders. Homy is just one.
Hmm, how many stakeholders we should have?
Cool, less more. Just focus on main user functions:grinning:
Idk. I'm putting down Homy and the development team (us).
We need to define our roles within the project.
We're all developers. <@U4F33615G> I'm also putting you down as front-end developer
<@U4FP56WS2> You can also be test analyst? Or do you have something else in mind? What are your strengths?
Ok I think we should do Project Charter as a team. When are people free Monday?
I can meet anytime after 2:30 PM.
Or before 12:30 PM
Test analyst is ok
After 11.30pm before17.30pm ,I can meet anytime
you mean 11:30AM?
In the Ruby on Rails,I just a freshman- today I do the chapter 3 in c9 , maybe I can do do the mechanical work
Yeah 11.30am
The time you decide to see it! I am ok!
Ok I'm just waiting to hear from the others.
Actually it's okay. We'll just continue to talk it through on here.
I'll be available after 3PM
I'm adopting myself if I can handle front-end work.
Am I the only one doing front-end?
It depends. We don't have to follow our roles exactly as it's laid out in the charter.
i will do the front end too
Ok. What's your experience with that?
Monday I am available
When monday?
I saw you want do project charter together
So. All day available for me
Alright so it looks like 3PM would be the best time on monday
Last semester cloud computing my team used Node.js for back end and I know Django so maybe back end also can help but I need learn ROR first
So for this project I m flexible XD
Yeah that's good. ROR is about as easy as Django and Node.js I think. So how about we meet at the Vine cafe at 3PM Monday. Vine is the cafe on level 2 in building 80. Usually lots of seating there.
I m ok
internet in building 80 is lagging as well, but better than library anyway

I emailed Homy with questions about project charter and he actually got back to me! He explained the stakeholders thing so it's all good now I think. But I was thinking we should meet Monday anyway. That can be our new meeting time maybe? It makes more sense to have our meeting before the tutorial, not after.
I got mongoDB to work on heroku!! :grin:
:confetti_ball:
Btw I was thinking we should come up w/ a better name for our website. Cause I was thinking we can borrow from OkCupid but idk if we should do an exact copy or clone. We can make it our own.
Here's some names I've thought of so far:
- eMatch
- matchmakr
- eHearts
- MatchMe
Here is our repo: <https://github.com/ellisjas/dating-site>

attachments.text: dating-site - Dating site made for the capstone programming project at RMIT University.

text: You can clone it into your C9 workspace
But always be sure to not push to master unless someone's looked over your work first. Always do your development on your own branches, never master branch.
Our Heroku. Not much there at the moment: <https://stormy-dusk-23559.herokuapp.com/>
<@U4FP56WS2> Can you try to finish login test cases by Monday? I want to implement login asap so we have something to show Homy on Wednesday.
<@U4FP56WS2> By wednesday we would also need all test cases for registration.
<@U4F33615G> Need those wireframes for login and homepage asap. Registration wireframe should be finished by Wednesday.

<@U4F33615G> Btw I was thinking we need to combine 'Answer Match Questions' and 'Registration' into one. I don't want users to be successfully registered until after the complete the match questions, so it'll be part of it.
*they
<@U4K11P9MH> Sorry what's your student number again?
<@U4K11P9MH> Nevermind I got.
OK
